Plan: 1 to modify.

Summary by type:
  tables: 1 to modify

Tables:
  ~ users
    + tenant_access_policy (policy)
    - user_tenant_isolation (policy)

DDL to be executed:
--------------------------------------------------

-- Transaction Group #1
DROP POLICY IF EXISTS user_tenant_isolation ON users;

CREATE POLICY tenant_access_policy ON users TO PUBLIC USING (tenant_id = 1);
